# Keywords AI

> Keywords AI is a full-stack LLM engineering platform for developers and PMs. It helps AI teams build, monitor, and evaluate AI performance.


## Docs
- [Overview](https://docs.keywordsai.co/get-started/overview): Introduction of features in Keywords AI.
- [AI observability quickstart](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/monitoring/overview): Guide to set up AI observability
- [AI gateway](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/generation/overview): Guide to set up the AI gateway which allows developers call 300+ LLMs in a single format.
- [Prompt management](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/prompt/overview): Guide to create, monitor, and improve prompts in Keywords AI.
- [LLM evals](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/evaluation/overview): Guide to set up LLM evals to evaluate LLM output efficiently.


## Reference
- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Keywords-AI/keywordsai): An open-sourced package for AI agent tracing.
- [Y Combinator Profile](https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/keywords-ai): Y Combinator official page about Keywords AI 
- [Company Blog](https://www.keywordsai.co/blog): Guide, tutorials, and news that written by Keywords AI team
- [API Reference](https://docs.keywordsai.co/api-endpoints/integration/request-logging-endpoint): Detailed API documentation for advanced integrations
